extends java.lang.Object
    Configuration for session management.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getExpiryMSec()
      Returns the interval in milliseconds after which inactive sessions are considered expired.

      Returns the interval in milliseconds between when sessions are maintained.

      Returns true for session management enabled.

      Toggle session management on and off.

      Returns the interval in milliseconds after which inactive sessions are considered expired.
